name: RPG Minesweeper Excel
description:
Are you bored  at work?

Do you want to play video games  while you look like you are working?

You can't run .exe files at work?

If you answered yes to the questions above then this game is for you.

To run this game all you need is MS Excel 

Note:

Rules are the same as MamonoSweeper

watch this video for tutorial
